cast.overview: The comedic adventures of an introverted boy left on the doorstep of a pair of reluctant, eccentric great-uncles, whose exotic remembrances stir the boy's spirit and re-ignite the men's lives.
cast.title: Secondhand Lions

details.biography: Cory Sinclair (Born January 24, 1984) is an actor and musician. He is one of the band members of, The Manichean. He composes music for both stage and film under the name, Hescher. He recently appeared in a live performance of "The Pillowman" in 2024, where he won "Best Breakthrough Performance" for his portrayal of "Katurian" at the 2024 Houston Theater Awards.
details.name: Cory Sinclair
